org.cse.client.utils
Class SOPHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.cse.client.utils.SOPHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
JSONProvider
public class SOPHelper
extends Object
implements JSONProvider

Same Origin Policy helper class allowing to fetch JSON into the current site in form of JavaScript element.
